segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink overflowing with water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, oblivious, drying her plate like nothing's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle already, and if she slips, it could be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, sneaking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that stoolâ€”it's tilting backward, he could fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there helping him, reaching for a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's running down the cabinets, ruining everything in its path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so safe and tidy, what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is making me nervous; accidents are waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't the woman paying attention to what's going on behind her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies are spilling out, and the plate might drop any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't watch without worrying about the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR
